text: The Calgary Roughnecks is a box lacrosse team in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. It is part of the West Division of the National Lacrosse League. It plays its home games in Scotiabank Saddledome. The team joined the league in 2001. It has won the league championship twice, in 2004 and 2009. Category:Sports teams in Calgary Category:National Lacrosse League Category:2001 establishments in Canada
title: Calgary Roughnecks
